svg.title: Knowledge Transfer & Onboarding Workflow - Context Mastery System
svg.desc: Systematic workflow for transferring context knowledge to new team members, ensuring consistent understanding and accelerated onboarding with progress tracking, competency validation, and personalized learning paths
svg.text: Context Mastery System - Systematic Team Knowledge Transfer & Accelerated Onboarding

g.text: Start Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Current Phase: 2 of 4 (Context Deep Dive)
ETA: 3 days remaining | Mentor: Alex Rodriguez | Next milestone: Practical Application
Priority Focus: Problem Solving & Debugging Skills
Recommended: 2 hours guided debugging sessions with Alex, practice scenarios
Suggested: Video tutorials + hands-on practice with real scenarios
Available: Self-paced learning modules, completion not required for Phase 3
Next Check-in: Today 3:00 PM | Response time: <30 min
Code review session - Architecture patterns (2 hours ago)
Onboarding pace: On track (+2 days ahead)
